evidence.text:
Person A: May I confirm that is yours?
Person B: Here you go. Take it.

Person B: Why did you steal my gosling?
Person A: I’m a fox. I do foxy things. It’s in my nature.

Person B: My power core. It is damaged. Without it I rely on my solar surfaces and batteries.
Person A: Yeah, you should work on that.
Person B: I also need a replacement transmitter.
Person A: Ugh, do I have to do everything? When we run across another robot we’ll kill it and take its transmitter.

Person B: Negative. Rozzum inhibition protocols prevent deliberate harm to others.
Person A: Look. You need to learn how things work on this island.
Person A: Me, the bear, everybody, we’re all just trying to survive. And kindness, is not a survival skill.
Person A: Yeah. So, uh, how’d you get a gosling, anyways?
Person B: There was an accident. I terminated his family.
Person A: For future reference, you probably want to keep all that to yourself.
Person B: Understood. Do not mention dead family. Fink, how long do you estimate swim and fly to take?
Person A: Swimming’s easy. I can teach him the way my mom taught me. Swim.
Person B: Fink! He will not learn that way.
Person A: Not if you keep doing that.
Person A: Just between us, this whole thing may not take as long as you think. Your gosling, he isn’t exactly normal.
Person B: I have a defective baby?
Person A: He’s what they call a ‘runt’.
Person B: A runt.
Person A: Fact is, even if his whole family hadn’t been killed, he probably wouldn’t have lived very long. Just, I don’t know. Don’t get too attached to the little guy, that’s all.
Person A: If you want, I could eat him right now and save you the grief later.
Person B: Negative. Eating this task is not the same as completing it.
Person A: So we’re doing this. Well, if you don’t want me or anyone else to eat him, you’re going to need a place that’s safer than out here... which is a great idea! New project!

Person A: Paddler? Local laughing stock. Spends every day trying to cut down the biggest tree on the island. He’s obsessed. Kind of like you and your task hang up.
Person A: Hey Paddler. You’re never going to finish that.

Person B: He doesn’t need to know.
Person B: Seriously? He needs room for me and my stuff.
